body.name: Cuisinart PRC-12FR Classic Stainless Percolator, Stainless Steel (Renewed),12 cups
body.stockDetail: Only 17 left in stock - order soon.
features: Classic stainless-steel percolator brews from 4 to 12 cups of coffee
Circulates hot water through grounds; pulses into glass knob to create familiar percolating sound
Ready-to-serve indicator light; detachable cord; drip-free spout; easy-grip knob on the lid
Stay-cool bottom allows unit to sit safely on any surface without scarring
body.description: An elegant way to serve coffee to dinner guests, this classic stainless-steel percolator brews from 4 to 12 cups of great-tasting coffee. The unit circulates piping hot water through coffee grounds and pulses up into the glass knob on top to create the familiar percolating sound that coffee lovers love. A ready-to-serve light indicates when the coffee has finished brewing, and the detachable cord makes it easy to serve freshly perked coffee right at the table without any hassle. Other useful features include a precision drip-free spout, a simple-grip knob on the unit's lid, and a stay-cool bottom that allows the percolator to sit safely on any surface without scarring. Combining present-day technology with the retro look of a '50s kitchen, the percolator measures approximately 8 by 6 by 12 inches and carries a three-year limited warranty. Editor's note: This is a remanufactured small appliance. Remanufactured generally means that the appliance has been returned to the manufacturer, who returns the appliance to like-new condition. Some appliances may contain cosmetic blemishes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2008
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perconow and Percolator !!
reviews.reviewText: I was already in the market for a percolator. I mean nothing makes a better cup of coffee than a percolator. I was ready to shell out $50+ for one when I ran across this one. At THIS price, how could I NOT get it? Let me tell you, I love it. Rich coffee, rich aroma, and rich pockets since it was less than 1/3 the price of a new one. I can't speak on longevity just yet, but I will update. Yes, a few grinds of the fine ground coffee gets pass, but you won't even see them until you get to the very bottom of your cup. All percolators do this. To remedy this, just use the 3.5" perc filters. You get 100 for about a buck. Also, let me say that this thing is beautiful. Mirror finish with a unique shaped handle. And the way the "skirt" sits flushed on the countertop, lovely. And, of course, the clear knob on top. Who dosen't turn into a big kid when they see the coffee percolating? Something this nice for this price I had to give it five stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2008
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Makes great coffee
reviews.reviewText: I bought this after reading the reviews and got a great price as it was refurbished. It is very sleek, doesn't take up a lot of room on the counter & makes great coffee in around 4 minutes. We simply fold a regular coffee filter into quarters & tear a very small hole to fit over the inside piece, use regular ground coffee (put your finger over the top of the metal tube that fits into the clear top piece to keep coffee out of the pot circulation). The smell & sound of coffee perking was missing with our Bunn drip coffee maker. The coffee is hotter than the Bunn too. We love it & have actually ordered a total of 4 for gifts & to have an extra percolator when this one burns out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great coffee pot-would recommend it!
reviews.reviewText: We bought a refurbished one and it works just great. Great taste, keeps coffee hot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars This percolator is the bomb!!
reviews.reviewText: I've always heard that percolators make the best coffee. The reviews for this product we're all positive so I decided to take a chance and purchase it. I have been using drip coffees for quite a long time. Since chemistry was one of weaker subjects. I could never seem to get the ratio right. Hence my coffee always tasted burnt. I decided to switch to percolator coffee and was so pleasantly surprised how easy it is to make the coffee and the taste was far superior than the drip. So glad I finally converted to the percolator!!!! You will be very happy with this purchase

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely fantastic coffee maker… we use it every morning
reviews.reviewText: Do you want a great cup of coffee in the morning this is the product I highly recommend it I use it every day and have coffee up until noon and it’s still nice and hot …Buy 2…get one for upstairs and downstairs

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent tasting percolated cofffee
reviews.reviewText: This is another great Cusinart product. It produces tasty coffee. A coarser grind of coffee is recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Mine is refurbished
reviews.reviewText: Updated…..Well this was pretty good until it stopped perking my coffee 2 days ago. It got hot but the coffee never come up the pipe into the lid. Nothing happened but the water got warm in the bottom of the pot. I’m pretty sad about it too. I like the extra flavor from perking it and also having a actual Hot cup of coffee. I returned it 🙁I’m pleased with the fact I only paid 40$ for it. It takes 4 to 5 minutes to brew which is good. I use the disc filters so very little coffee grounds. The flavor of the coffee is good. That’s why I wanted one because I want more flavorful coffee. The stay hot feature could be better because your second cup isn’t warm enough for me. I am concerned about the clear knob on top the lid being plastic because I’ve read some people had theirs crack. I can see how too. That should have been glass. Being cuisnart I expected it to be better made. But it’s light and cheap looking which if you paid full price it makes wonder what you paid 80$ for. So coffee is good in it. But seems poorly made and needs a better stay warm feature.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect pot of Coffee
reviews.reviewText: We ditched the coffee pots and we love the Perculator. This one is good. Some have complained about the lid and we have had no problems with it breaking. We have the perfect pot of coffee every morning.
